text: Norbert Balatsch (; 10 March 1928 â€“ 6 May 2020) was an Austrian conductor. He was known as a choral conductor, who began as a baritone choir singer. He was the long-term choir director of both the Vienna State Opera and the Bayreuth Festival. He won two Grammy Awards. Balatsch was born in Vienna. Balatsch died on 6 May 2020 in Vienna, aged 92.Ehemaliger Staatsopernchordirektor Balatsch ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== * Balatsch, Norbert OEML Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian conductors Category:Austrian Grammy Award winners Category:People from Vienna
